description: PURL type for ISO-IEC 19770-2 Software Identification (SWID) tags, uniquely identifying software products.

namespace_definition.description: Optional namespace containing the software creator's name (required if specified) and an optional registration ID (regid) as a second segment. A maximum of two segments are supported.

qualifiers_definition.description: The tagId as defined in the SWID SoftwareIdentity element. GUIDs must be lowercase. If not a GUID, case-aware but case-insensitive.
The tagVersion as defined in the SWID SoftwareIdentity element. Must be an integer. Defaults to 0 if not specified.
Indicates whether the SWID tag corresponds to a patch. Defaults to false if not specified.
The entity that created the SWID tag, if different from the software creator.
The registration ID (regid) of the entity that created the SWID tag, if different from the software creator.

repository.description: SWID PURLs do not reference a package repository.
